original_title: Gary Russell Jr vs Mark Magsayo
overview: Featherweight World Champion Gary Russell Jr. defends his title against top contender Mark Magsayo in an exciting main event between two of the worldâ€™s best 126-pounders. The Maryland native Russell has been champion since 2015, successfully defending his belt on five occasions. The Filipino sensation Magsayo scored a career-best victory over former champ Julio Ceja in August to earn his first shot at championship gold. Plus, a rematch between 140-pound contenders Subriel Matias and Petros Ananyan in the co-main event. Live on Showtime.
title: Gary Russell Jr vs Mark Magsayo
